title: WND Survey request
author: VD
content_html: WorldNetDaily is running a survey and I’d appreciate it if you’d consider taking it. It’s only 20 checkbox-style questions and it requires no registration or email address. It’s a nice opportunity to give them some feedback on where you’d like things to go in the future… and among the questions happens to be one about letting them know who your favorite WND columnists are.
content_text:
WorldNetDaily is running a survey and I’d appreciate it if you’d
consider taking it
.  It’s only 20 checkbox-style questions and it requires no registration or email address.  It’s a nice opportunity to give them some feedback on where you’d like things to go in the future… and among the questions happens to be one about letting them know who your favorite WND columnists are.
